title: ‘Highlander’ Reboot Starring Henry Cavill Moves Forward
description:

title: Sylvester Stallone To Return For ‘Samaritan 2’
description:
The 2022 superhero movie Samaritan, which premiered via Prime Video, is getting a sequel. Furthermore, actor Sylvester Stallone is returning to star in Samaritan 2 and act as producer. As revealed via THR, Bragi F. Schut has been hired to pen the script for the sequel after having penned the original film. In addition to [...]

title: Quentin Tarantino Reveals Stephen King Movie That Left Him Disappointed
description:

title: ‘Beetlejuice 2’ Release Date Could Be In Trouble
description:
It was quite exciting to see Beetlejuice 2, after years of rumors and false starts, finally get greenlit. It was even more exciting to see production actually start.
